Pre-Game Insights: France was considered the main favorite to win the trophy, but although it did not play badly in the match against Spain in the semifinals and opened the scoring in the 9th minute, it was turned back in the first half.
Italy won only the first match in the group and the same was quite difficult, 2-1 against Albania.
The weakest match played by Italy was in the confrontation with Spain, where they were led from one end to the other and luckily lost only 1-0.
In the third match, Italy recorded a draw, score 1-1 with Italy, which qualified them for the round of 16, where they played another weak match, being eliminated by Switzerland.
Luciano Spalletti was reconfirmed as coach and hopes to qualify the national team for the 2026 World Cup.
